name: dorado
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, tropical fish that is often eaten as food: My favourite fishes are grouper, snapper, and dorado (or mahi mahi). If you catch a dorado you can take it home and ask the chef to cook it for supper. Synonym
mahi mahi
(also golden dorado) a large fish found in rivers in South America: The dorado is a very popular game fish. They went on a fishing trip for golden dorado.
More examplesFewer examplesHe landed a 17lbs electric blue dorado.For fresh food, he caught dorado and squid.The freshwater dorado is not related to the saltwater fish also called dorado.
